item.title: Reached Word Limit
item.dc:creator: slcott
item.description:
I tried generating a language model using ~130k words to test the limits of the framework. I reached the following problem. I don’t see in the API how to alter this value.

Starting wfreq2vocab
The number of records 64001 reach the user-defined limit 64000, consider to increase the number of records by -records

item.title: Reply To: Reached Word Limit
item.dc:creator: Halle Winkler
item.description:
Welcome,

There’s no way in the API to alter it. Functional vocabulary sizes for offline recognition are between 20 and perhaps 1000 words depending on the vocabulary.
